text: Nihagira umwe mu bagore banyu ubacika agasanga abahakanyi (ntibabasubize inkwano mwabatanzeho), hanyuma habaho kurwana na bo mukabatsinda (mukagira iminyago mubakuraho), mujye muha abo abagore babo bagiye (bakaza babasanga) ibingana nâ€™ibyo bari barabatanzeho (inkwano). Kandi mugandukire Allah We mwemera
